channel.title: [508 Pali] How to link to mysql?
channel.description: I've customized my server and is ready for public release, however there is one feature I'd like - the ability to get the number of messages on the welcome screen linked to a mysql column. I'm sure this has been done before, so if anyone can help me, please do.

item.title: [508 Pali] How to link to mysql?
item.dc:creator: @Brenhein Brenhein
item.description:
@Brenhein wrote:

I’ve customized my server and is ready for public release, however there is one feature I’d like - the ability to get the number of messages on the welcome screen linked to a mysql column. I’m sure this has been done before, so if anyone can help me, please do.
